summary: My second sword I've 3D modelled, and textured, from scratch :)
descriptionHtml:
So this is the second sword I have 3D modelled from scratch using Blender, and also textured myself using GIMP. I'm hoping it's an improvement on my last one :) The sword can be crafted at the forge under the steel category, and also tempered. It has stats similar to an ebony sword, so is quite good, but not overpowered.

Installation: Just install normally via NMM, or extract the esp to your data folder, and merge the meshes and textures folders with the ones in your data folder.

Installing Update 1.1: Follow the instructions on the file download page.

Compatibility: There shouldn't be any issues.

Hope you like it! :)
author: simsim899

files.name: Clip Point Blade Update
files.changelogHtml:
Scaled down the size of the sword slightly so it seems more realistic.
Added an environment map so the handle isn't shiny ( it may have been very slightly before).
Added blood effects to the sword so when you hit people it will get bloody.
